title: 10/10 Taiwan National Day â€” Stand With Taiwan

replies.msg:
10/10 is Taiwan’s National Day. For months now, the people of Taiwan have stood with Hong Kong, and this week the Taiwanese government expelled mainland tourists for damaging a Lennon Wall.

In response to Taiwan’s support for Hong Kong, Apple this week succumbed to pressure from China and pulled the Taiwanese flag from the HK keyboard in the latest regional iOS update.

Let’s celebrate Taiwan’s National Day, and send Apple a clear message, by waving the Taiwanese flag and buying from Taiwanese stores in Hong Kong. The fight for freedom in Hong Kong is a fight also for Taiwan’s freedom. We are in this together. Taiwan’s two days of public holidays (10/10 and 10/11) are an opportunity for us to show our gratitude and appreciation for Taiwan. ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡¼ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡¼ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡¼
